versos: (true) John 17:3 - "Now this is eternal life: that they know you, the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom you have sent.";;;
(book) "And when they found it not, they returned to Jerusalem, seeking it." - Luke 2:45;;;
(heard) Isaiah 30:21 - "Whether you turn to the right or to the left, your ears will hear a voice behind you, saying, This is the way; walk in it.";;;
(heaven) Matthew 3:16 - As soon as Jesus was baptized
(saying) Genesis 1:3 - "And God said, 'Let there be light,' and there was light.";;;
(poured) Psalm 22:14 - I am poured out like water
(oft) Psalm 105:19 - "Until the time that his word came: the word of the LORD tried him.";;;
(saith) Genesis 1:3 - "And God said, Let there be light: and there was light.";;;
(subject) 1 Peter 2:13-14: "Be subject for the Lord's sake to every human institution...";;;
(happy) Psalm 144:15 - "happy are the people whose God is the Lord";;;
(least) Matthew 25:40 - "Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me.";;;

(tossed) Ephesians 4:14 - "Then we will no longer be infants, tossed back and forth by the waves, and blown here and there by every wind of teaching and by the cunning and craftiness of people in their deceitful scheming.";;;

(tongues) 1 Corinthians 12:10 - "to another the working of miracles, to another prophecy, to another the ability to distinguish between spirits, to another various kinds of tongues, to another the interpretation of tongues.";;;
(utterly) 1 Samuel 15:3 - "Now go and strike Amalek and devote to destruction all that they have. Do not spare them, but kill both man and woman, child and infant, ox and sheep, camel and donkey.";;;

(escape) 1 Corinthians 10:13 - No temptation has overtaken you except what is common to mankind. And God is faithful; he will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear. But when you are tempted, he will also provide a way out so that you can endure it.;;;
(conceit) Philippians 2:3 - "Do nothing out of selfish ambition or vain conceit. Rather, in humility value others above yourselves.";;;
(reader) "He who reads let him understand" - Matthew 24:15;;;
(princes) Psalm 148:11 - Kings of the earth and all peoples
